alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Livingston and west central Tangipahoa Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albany, or 10 miles west of Hammond. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston and Albany. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 19 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston
